ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Equipment Rehash...
ygData.msgSnippet: At lvl 55 I have: Imbrued legs Imbrued Arms Imbrued Bracers Singing Steel Gloves (also have imbrued and gloves of fiery might for special occasions) Singing
ygData.messageBody:
At lvl 55 I have:

Imbrued legs
Imbrued Arms
Imbrued Bracers
Singing Steel Gloves (also have imbrued and gloves of fiery might for
special occasions)
Singing Steel Boots (also have imbrued)
New Headband from Kael forget the name (13ac 10 charisma)
Mithril Torque
Treeweave (wish i had imbrued)
tattered mantle
Cloak of Shadows
Bard Belt from sky (cant remember name)
charisma rings
opalline earrings

Weapons:

Partisan
Crystalline Short Sword

Would like to get symphonic saber and harmonic dagger\blade of harmony

Instruments: (should have gone on more dragon raids in my "youth")

7 string lute
Nostrolo Tamborine
Minotaur horn

Mike Mott
Conoco, Inc.
BPE COC Support Team
Cherokee 2030

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [SMTP:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 3:26 PM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Equipment Rehash...
>
> Ok, I know we've been over and over this, and I even saved some of the
> emails, but....as our IT department is having a crackdown and we are in
> the
> midst of a merger, they enforced our 40mb limit on mailbox sizes and yes,
> I
> admit it, I trashed my store of eqbards mails ... bad me!
>
> Anyway, what I would like to know is what you high level bards are wearing
> and weilding .. the weapons/instruments you actually use up into the
> mid-high 50s. I'd also like to know if you feel like it, where I can get
> these items .. yes I can look them up but feeling lazy today!
>
> As soon as Halana hits 59 (I've given up on 60), I'm going to start
> focusing
> on BRD.
>
> Currently, Tani has (forgive me for spelling mistakes):
>
> -sionoche's partisan
> -journeymans stick
> -mistmoore drums (working on getting selos)
> -lute from mistmoore
> -dragonborne sash
> -lizzie cloak
> -those earrings from mistmoore
> -fire opal rings
> -fungi tunic
> -kylong legs, bracers, hat
> -ss boots, gloves
> -tattered mantle
> -forget the necklace
>
> Let me know which items you all think I can improve on .. especially
> weaponwise...if you want send me a private email so Im not spamming
> everyone
> - this is already long!
>
> Thanks, smooches, love you all :)
>
> Halana, 58th Shammykins
> Tani, 41st Bardette
> Solusek Ro
